fixed_xml: <ITEM>6. Eine Schul-Edition von <BIBL><AUTHOR>Tacitus</AUTHOR></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Homers</AUTHOR> operg, am liebsten der von <AUTHOR>Wolf</AUTHOR></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nieuport</AUTHOR> de ritibus Romanorum, am liebsten die mit dem Anhange von <AUTHOR>Homelius</AUTHOR> de tribunnali pretoris versehene Ausgabe</BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia hebraice</TITLE> ex ed. <AUTHOR>V an der Hoogt</AUTHOR></BIBL></ITEM>
explanation: The tag <AUTHOR=Wolf</AUTHOR> was incorrect. XML tags cannot contain equals symbols. The correct format is <AUTHOR>Wolf</AUTHOR>.
